entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
